snippet: A 2-year-old boy who was wandering with a dog a couple of blocks from home in Hopkinsville was killed Monday morning after both were hit by a CSX train.
abstract: Two-year-old boy Trayton Joiner, wandering with a dog in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, is hit and killed by train.
lead_paragraph: A 2-year-old boy who was wandering with a dog a couple of blocks from home in Hopkinsville was killed Monday morning after both were hit by a CSX train.

headline.main: Kentucky: Train Kills 2-Year-Old Wandering With Dog
headline.print_headline: Kentucky: Train Kills 2-Year-Old Wandering With Dog
